description:
Linux kernel 6.7 reached end of life and all users are now recommended to upgrade their systems to the latest Linux 6.8 kernel as soon as possible.

The post Linux Kernel 6.7 Reaches End of Life, Users Urged to Upgrade to Linux Kernel 6.8 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Linux Kernel 6.7 Reaches End of Life, Users Urged to Upgrade to Linux Kernel 6.8

description:
Linux firmware update utility fwupd is moving away from XZ Utils and will use zstd (Zstandard) for future releases for compressing metadata.

The post Linux Firmware Update Utility Fwupd Will Use Zstd Compression for Future Releases appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Linux Firmware Update Utility Fwupd Will Use Zstd Compression for Future Releases
